answers.answer: The good news is that you're really close to due and baby will probably be born healthy and strong. I've heard of women with preeclampsia having to deliver at thirty weeks or even sooner. At that close to term baby will probably not even need nicu time.Focus on baby. You're gonna do great! Have you already talked to work about maternity leave?
I had it wit my first son delivered at 35 weeks he was born 4pounds 8oz went tu the full term nursery didn't stay any extra days in the hospital

question: 37 weeks and 3 days and just found out I have preeclampsia and I will be delivering this weekend/early next week. I don't know how to feel less stressed and keep calm. I wish the father was here in her life, and my life for comfort but that's not the case.. Anyone else ever gone through this? I am a first time mom, doing it all on my own. Any tips to stay less stressed as possible?
title: Just found out
